index_terms: FIRE DEPARTMENT DEPARTMENT OF PARKS AND RECREATION
summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing, in 2004, acceptance of funding from non-City sources; authorizing the Department of Parks and Recreation, the Department of Transportation, the Human Services Department, the Seattle Fire Department and the Seattle Police Department to accept specified grants and private funding.
note: Boren-Pike-Pine Park, Todd Shipyards Security, Bullet-proof vests
